tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE document_history (
  document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  version_number INT,
  editor_id UUID,
  edited_date TIMESTAMP,
  edit_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE revisions (
    revision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id UUID,
    revision_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    editor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    revision_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE edits (
    edit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    revision_id UUID,
    editor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    edit_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    edited_content TEXT NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE documents (document_id INT PRIMARY KEY, document_name VARCHAR(50), content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE revisions (revision_id INT PRIMARY KEY, document_id INT, revision_number INT, revision_date TIMESTAMP, content TEXT, author VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE authors (author_id INT PRIMARY KEY, author_name VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE document_history (history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, document_id INT, revision_id INT, action VARCHAR(50), action_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE document_edit_history (
    document_id INT,
    edit_id INT,
    editor_id INT,
    edit_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    edit_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE document_revisions (
    revision_id INT,
    document_id INT,
    editor_id INT,
    revision_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    revision_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE revision_comments (
    comment_id INT,
    revision_id INT,
    commenter_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
